Text:
does this version require sata drivers prior to installation?

i'm trying to load xp on my new slate tablet pc with an msata ssd, and am not sure what drivers i need to get xp to recognize the ssd. My tablet is an asus ep121 with an i5 processor, 4gb ram.

any help is greatly appreciated.
You will have problems. You usealy need a floppy drive to install the drivers :-(

How to Load SATA Drivers in Windows XP Setup:

http://www.sevenforums.com/tutorials/66010-sata-drivers-load-windows-xp-setup-dual-boot.html

Windows XP x64 does not have a SP3. SP2 is latest for XP x64.
